abstract: Angelique Kerber defeats Timea Bacsinszky to draw Germany even with Switzerland in first round of Fed Cup; other tennis news noted.
snippet: Angelique Kerber, who won the Australian Open last month, was given a hero’s welcome as she marked her return to her homeland with a victory that drew Germany even with Switzerland at 1-1 in the first round of the Fed Cup.
lead_paragraph: Angelique Kerber, who won the Australian Open last month, was given a hero’s welcome as she marked her return to her homeland with a victory that drew Germany even with Switzerland at 1-1 in the first round of the Fed Cup.
